short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keeps a spare blank tab open to switch to in case a new tab needed

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You know how Vivaldi is slow to create a new tab? Especially when you have a lot of tabs open.
This extension keeps a new tab already open waiting for you at the end for the tab bar.

To use Ctrl/Cmd+T to switch to it go to "Preferences" -> "Keyboard" -> "Tab", remove "Ctrl/Cmd+T" from "New Tab" and assign it to "Switch to the Last Tab".
